response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a significant discount from its original value of $12,000, tailored to help you maximize your investment. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
